channel.title: Hugo on Nico Holmberg
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Nico Holmberg

item.title: Welcome to my website!
item.description: Greetings and welcome! You have stumbled upon the personal website and blog of Nico Holmberg, a 26 year old Finn pursuing a doctoral degree in Computational Quantum Chemistry. Feel free to check out my profile for more information about me, my professional projects and other interests!
